Reviews.Title: Does the job.
Reviews.Author: NZgirl
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I am planning to take a backpacking trip to New Zealand in a couple of months, and wanted something that could take a bit of a beating while I'm out there. When I am kayaking, I want to be able to take a camera out with me. I am also about to go parasailing, so I got the camera now so that I could test it out on the water.I had originally planned on taking a very expensive DSLR to NZ, but was convinced otherwise because it is extremely heavy for a backpacker, and I would also probably eventually end up breaking it. Instead of breaking a very expensive camera, I bought this camera, for $100, at this link:http://www.amazon.com/Coleman-Waterproof-Digital-Floating-Accessory/dp/B004WSLZ5U/ref=sr_1_5?ie=UTF8&qid;=1342658199&sr;=8-5&keywords;=coleman+digital+cameraEven though I bought the camera in a kit instead of from this page, I thought I should write the review here because the camera seems to be taking quite a beating from reviews of people who probably didn't understand the camera.First of all, this camera is NOT a camera for people who are serious photographers looking for high quality shots. You don't buy a camera for $100 and expect it to take professional photos. It's pretty simple. If you are looking for something like that, you might want to up your budget for a camera by about $1,000.00. I knew that when I bought it. That said, there are a few things you need to expect if you buy this. First of all, there IS a delay between the time you press the button for a photo, and the time it takes the photo. This isn't a particularly big issue for me. Also, the image quality isn't the best, but it does the job I wanted it to do. Another note is that photo quality is generally better outdoors than indoors. However, I was able to get decent shots.When I turned on the camera, I was surprised to realize that it actually has a menu that lets you change the ISO, exposure,IMAGE QUALITY, white balance, and it also has several types of flash that you can use, which greatly change the quality of the photo. Many people have complained about poor photo quality, but if they would just take the time to change some settings, they would get a much better photo.I saw one complaint on the reviews about how hard it was to shut the door to the battery pack. It isn't difficult. If you try to just shut the door, it will not do it easily. However, there is a lever on the door- all you have to do is hold it back, and the door shuts easily. It might be a little tricky the first time to break it in, but I didn't have any issues. I might also add, I am a girl who is not very strong.Personally, I  would rather have a sturdy door than one that opens easily and exposes the battery and memory card to water.Another complaint was that the microphone flooded. Here's a trick- use the plug. Problem solved.I used this camera in water and it was fine. If you are expecting excellent photos in the water, DON'T USE IT IN MURKY WATER. If you get icky photos because of it, it's not the camera's fault. It's your own dang fault because you took a photo of murky water. If you want crystal clear photos, get a water purifier.One reviewer commented that you couldn't get sound unless you plugged in a microphone. Not true. YOU DO NOT NEED TO PLUG IN A MICROPHONE. If you take the plug off the microphone, you WILL record sound. You will not hear it though until you load the video onto your computer. Why? Because its STUPID to put a speaker on a camera that is supposed to go underwater.One other complaint from a reviewer was this: "The "extra" battery that came with the kit doesn't fit the camera properly. It is a generic battery that pops out every time you try to charge the thing." -JessicaHow about turning the battery, Jessica? If you put the battery in the wrong way, it WILL pop out. It's to let you know that the battery is in wrong. I put it in wrong at first, but then I turned it around and guess what? It stayed in. EPIPHANY.All in all, this camera does what I want it to. I didn't expect professional photographs- it's a cheap camera. I will certainly miss my DSLR while I am in NZ, but it wouldn't stand a chance. This Coleman camera IS rugged. I also liked the blue color that I got. It was pretty. Except for the one, maybe two, reviews I saw about the camera having a defect, most of the reviews I saw were simple things that people could have figured out, had they simply taken the time to learn about the camera.

Reviews.Title: Don't listen to the rest
Reviews.Author: Toby Keathley "Pastor T"
Reviews.Content: Im not sure what camera was used in some of these negative reviews, but it's definitely not this one. I am a photographer by trade and this lil camera produces some pretty amazing shots for the $79 I paid. Great performance in and out of the water. Maybe you just need to know what you're doing before you buy a camera. Read the directions and you'll be pleased with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Surviving the grandkids
Reviews.Author: Randy "Auto Repair shop owner. I love Yoga, a...
Reviews.Content: Yes I gave to my 5-year old grandson and it is still taking pictures months later. I bought because of the quality of the picture and that it was designed for a harsh environment. I can think of no harsher environment than my grandson.

Reviews.Title: Buy at your own risk!!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Let me start off by saying that everything I have ever bought from Coleman has been very reliable and trustworthy. That being said:This is the worst product I have found in a long time. We have a family vacation coming up, and we wanted to get a camera that we can use for underwater. We researched a few cameras, and decided to go with this one. There was only one review on the whole web, and now I know why. This thing is a piece of work.First off...you can't shut the door that leads to the battery and memory card. I have tried to even knock it on the table and it just won't close. It closes when it wants. I am happy to see they take "water proof" seriously, but it would be nice to be able to open and shut that door, especially when the charging port is in that door as well. We have been trying all night to close the door back up, and can not do so.The picture quality is bad. I haven't used it in the water yet (plan to this weekend), but I took a few indoor pics (with flash), and they looked worse than when I take them on my phone camera (a G1 google outdated phone).It is sturdy, but cheaply made. I know, you get what you buy; and that we did. The shipping was way too high for it taking 6 days to get here (when I paid extra ($20)for expedited mail). I ordered stuff directly from amazon at the same time and paid significantly less and they both showed up on the same day, same time.The "extra" battery that came with the kit doesn't fit the camera properly. It is a generic battery that pops out every time you try to charge the thing. You have to sit it in the right position and DO NOT TOUCH IT or it will pop out and won't charge.I will write more when I try it in the water.Ok, so now I have used it multiple times in and out of the water. This is an outdoor camera. Do not buy this if you take mostly indoor shots. You will be very disappointed. As I mentioned before, the flash sucks. It is a very weak flash, and it either over exposes the picture or way under exposes it.As for underwater...I have tried it in the crisp clear Lake Superior, some semi-murky lakes, and a couple pools. When I used it in the lakes you couldn't see anything. When I used it in the pools you couldn't get a clear shot ever. It takes a long time to take one picture, and by the time it shoots you don't have any breath left so all you see is a blur of a person. Those disposable underwater cameras work better than this camera. Even if you have it on sport you can't get a clear shot unless you tell the person you are shooting to stand really still and don't breath until the camera takes the picture.The video quality is decent for a digital camera. We got some really cool cliff jumping videos with this camera in Lake Superior. The only thing that really sucks is when you use the camera for video there is no sound. There is a plug to plug in a microphone, but the sound is basically non-existent. You can hear the zooming in and out very well. It clicks really loud in your video. That is all you can hear. You can't use the plug if you are near water as it may seep into the camera and ruin it. So if you want sound it has to be on dry land.Overall, I hate it less than I did when I opened the package, but I still am very disappointed in this product. I don't write reviews often for items, but this was worthy of warning people of what you are buying. Don't buy it. Get a disposable underwater camera if you want to take water pictures. Don't spend $100 on this product!

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy
Reviews.Author: cpacosta
Reviews.Content: This camera was a major disappointment. Filled with water on the first day. Called Customer Service and they were already aware of the issue as they were receiving a number of returns for the same reason.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Strider
Reviews.Content: Taking pictures(and movies) under water is too much fun.  The quality of the videos was much better than I had expected.  Used it in both the pool and swimming with the fishes in Key West..........

Reviews.Title: Not the greatest pictures but it is rugged
Reviews.Author: ChicagoShaun
Reviews.Content: Haven't had any problems with it yet being dropped or in water.  Not amazing pictures, but they are fine for what we use it for.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: jairogtorres
Reviews.Content: this is what i wanted a very good camara that i can use any time, and any were, even under the water yes under the water you can take so many cool pictures

Reviews.Title: worse camera
Reviews.Author: Kehaulani
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for.  Cheaper is not better.  I got it because of the simplicity,come to find out is just sucks.  I used it once and it never worked again.  Could have just beena defect, but in general it was toy like.

Reviews.Title: Not a very good camera.
Reviews.Author: Jay Strange
Reviews.Content: I use reviews to guide me, and should have taken the vast number of negative reviews on here seriously. I understand many complaints are due to 'operator incompetence', and wanted to like this camera, but sadly, it's just not a well made piece of photographic equipment. We bought this for a vacation with plans to do some snorkeling/beach combing. The camera did so great until the day before we left, and then totally 'crapped out' on us. I think the biggest problem is the hatch for the battery/SD card. It's very hard to effectively close the thing. My wife (who has considerably less finger strength than I) couldn't even get it to shut, and it took me a while to really get it to snap proper (and I play bass, for the love of cripes). We did get some great underwater pics/video (fair quality picture and sound for a low-end camera) and some great outdoor shots, but I think moisture/humidity builds up in the not-quite-sealed compartment hatch, and that's what killed it. I believe this would be great for camping or other non-aquatic photos (just take some time getting to know the beast, and I assure you, you'll get some great shots), or for a kid, but isn't all that great for water. The deepest we took this thing was about 10 feet, so it really should not have met such a premature demise. That's a shame, Coleman has never let me down before, and perhaps they should just stick to what they do best- camping equipment. We probably would've been just as well off to have gotten a disposable u.w. camera. A five day shelf life is unacceptable for this. Seek another brand. I do, however, commend Amazon for their rapid response/refund time.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Camera With The Coleman Brand Name!!
Reviews.Author: MS Pitt "mspitt10"
Reviews.Content: I've never had a poor or bad Coleman outdoor product until I purchased this camera (Model No. C5WP Red).  I find it hard to believe that Coleman associates its name and brand reputation to this camera.  All photos taken with it are blurry and very grainy.  Don't even think about it's video capabilities, they are even worse.  It says this is a 12 mega pixel camera but it takes all photos, regardless of lighting conditions, as if it were back in the old days of 1 and 2 mega pixel cameras.  Very poor quality.  It might be good for young children learning how to use a camera but for nearly $100, it's too expensive.  Overall, highly disappointed with this camera and I don't recommend it in any way except for young children who really don't care about decent image quality.

Reviews.Title: Very bad product
Reviews.Author: Edgar ivan Del Toro
Reviews.Content: I just received the camera which I bought to my son. This really does not work, the battery was very difficult to enter, then, the screen is blinking at all  time, and Hasnt been possible to take pictures as this is freezing everytime we tried.I really don't know what to with this know, after paid more than US70.00. Additionally to my son bad experience that receives a birthday gift that do not work.Reaaly impresed with this Coleman product, This time I through the money to the trash.

Reviews.Title: worst camera ever
Reviews.Author: Brent Esker
Reviews.Content: What a waste of money!  Takes bad pics on land and even worse underwater.  Do not buy this camera!  The underwater pics are just a blur and this above water pics are over exposed.  The lcd display is so poorly lit, you can not see what you are aiming at.  Would never buy again!

Reviews.Title: Free Memory SDHC Memory card offer; but camera takes SD Micro !
Reviews.Author: Edmond J. (Skip) O'Neill "redhand32"
Reviews.Content: This camera was offered with a free Amazon 4 GB SDHC memory card included. However, it only takes SD Micro rendering the camera useless unless I can pickup the correct memory before my trip to Puerto Rico. I am also wary of the reviews for this camera too. AFter snorkling trip to Puerto Rico, the camera remained fully waterproof in 15-20 ft of water.However, the automatic shutoff time choices are too short and a nuicence. I alsoo notice that despite my former complaint requiring an Amazon Manager's intervention, Amazon is still bundling this camera with the incorrect memory card. This camers takes a MICRO SD.

Reviews.Title: Good value, so-so quality
Reviews.Author: R. Canham
Reviews.Content: 30 October 2013:  On 8 Oct, Elite e-mailed me that they don't have the blue camera and if I wanted blue (which I do), I'd have to wait 2-3 weeks.  As of today, they've not contacted me and still no camera, but it's only been 3 weeks.4 October 2013:  Update: Amazon never responded.  I called Coleman who would not help me and referred me to E-lite Brands: 800-441-1100, who told me to mail the camera and $10 check and they'd repair it or replace it.  We'll see.  So, don't expect much customer support.  Also, I could not find the manual in an electronic version anywhere (Elite said they don't have it electronically.)1 October 2013:  A quick note:  The buttons on the back of the camera broke inside their rubber casing last week, about 6 weeks after I purchased the camera.  I had only used it about 8 days.  I e-mailed Amazon for help, as the 30 return policy was over.  I will update this as I learn new info.  So, bottom line is, it takes decent photos if you learn how to use it, but it is not a good quality camera, which should be obvious based on the price for a camera rated to 30 feet below the surface.The following is my original review:September 2013:First off, many thanks to NZ Girl for her honest and VERY useful review.  She prompted me to buy this camera and her review will save you many headaches.  So, read her review and learn.I just returned from a week in Jamaica and here's my results.I took over 850 photos, some above water but the most below.I would estimate that about 60% of photos came out blurry, faded, or otherwise poor quality.That said, the other photos were very nice.I took photos snorkeling and scuba diving.The battery appears to have lost some life and doesn't last as long as it did when I first started using it.This camera is well worth the money, as long as you'd like to be able to take underwater photos for an inexpensive price.  Just remember to take 4-5 photos of everything and you'll have enough good photos that you'll be pleased.When I dove the camera worked well until about 30 feet or so, which is how deep the camera is rated.  When I went below that depth it just wouldn't work.  That didn't bother me at all.I took some videos and they came out very nice.  I added a couple of my photos to the product page.I shot some photos on Macro setting, but that setting didn't appear to make a difference.The bottom line for me is that this camera is a good buy, just don't expect to take action shots (mine all came out blurry) but some of the other shots will be very good if you hold the camera still.The tiny manual is printed in very small font and is not very informative.Over all, it's worth the cheap price, even if it a pretty lousy camera and customer support is poor.  I got some nice photos in the end and so I'd say but it - but don't expect a high quality camera.  I figure if I can use it for 2-3 vacations, I'll be happy.  Then maybe the good underwater cameras will have dropped in price so I am willing to buy one of them.I bought a 8GB card and it holds over 5,000 photos.  So, you won't run out of space for your photos.Take multiple shots of everything and you'll be pleased some of the results.Oh, when above water, wipe off the lens for a clearer photo.And, finally, this camera floats quite well.Buy, swim and enjoy.I did.

Reviews.Title: Water...Water...Water
Reviews.Author: James R. Young Sr.
Reviews.Content: I purchased for a vacation in Hawaii. I was looking forward to taking underwater video and photos.The first time used the camera in the WATER. WATER got into the camera...No underwater photos... :(

Reviews.Title: Terrible Camera!
Reviews.Author: Jimmy & Cari
Reviews.Content: We are returning this item for a refund. It is the most terrible, worthless camera I have ever seen. The LCD screen blinks & fades in & out constantly since the moment we first turned it on. The settings menus are as UN-intuitive as you can get. And the PHOTOS are the absolute WORST ever! Fifteen years ago I owned a HALF megapixel digital camera that took better photos than this thing. This camera is most definitely NOT a 12MP. The photos are not at all sharp, and there is such a horrible amount of color noise as to make them totally worthless. I sure expected more from a camera with the Coleman name on it.

Reviews.Title: Its AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for hubbys fishing trips, hes absolutely satisfied with it so far. The only complaint he had was you have to push the flash button every time (he goes night fishing).

Reviews.Title: OMG - This camera sucks!!!
Reviews.Author: momto3
Reviews.Content: This camera takes the worst pictures.  I've tried it on different settings, and in different light environments - and the picture quality is awful.  It is tolerable for bright light, subject not moving pictures.  However, we bought it for taking pictures swimming and underwater, and the pictures are so blurry.  We used to have the Kodak easy share underwater camera - LOVED IT - but after I lost that one on the beach, I decided to buy a less expensive camera, which was this one.  I am deeply regretting it.  I should have spent the extra money to get another Kodak.  Save your money, people.  This Coleman camera is beyond awful.

Reviews.Title: Not good quality
Reviews.Author: Zuky
Reviews.Content: The pictures were not clear at all. And after my second time using it, it didn't work anymore. Not a good product.

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY!
Reviews.Author: Leah
Reviews.Content: the camera worked fine, however the battery life is TERRIBLE. It needs HOURS and HOURS to charge, and if you use it for 20 minutes a whole bar goes down, you only get three. The next day I went to take it out and it was dead. Completely dead. I'm going to attempt to return it, but I may be S.O.L. And the chick who was talking about how difficult to open and close the battery port was right.

Reviews.Title: Has Fatal Flaw!!! Not always water tight!
Reviews.Author: Jodywalker
Reviews.Content: Water proof, but has fatal flaw....So, after purchasing this camera to take to Mexico I was really looking forward to taking underwater pictures when diving.  The performance was acceptable for a product at this price, except for the video (sounds like your in a tunnel). I hear people say get a microphone to help, but that is not practical for the purpose of the device.While in Mexico,  we were hanging around the pool alot and I had my camera with me.  It was attached to a lanyard around my neck I purchaced for it.  It was perfect.  I could take quick snap shots whenever I wanted and didn't have to worry about splashes or being dunked or anything.... Or so I thought...  We had just planned our diving trip for the following day and we went back to the pool for some drinks and fun.  After wading around for about half an hour I picked it up for a quick shot and noticed the battery door wide open and full of water!  Apparantly the design for the latch of the 'water tight' battery door has a fatal flaw, the plastic springloaded locking mechanism only just barely snaps the hatch closed and the slightest movement or bump opens it.  This design never should have made it past product testing..  I still salvaged the SD card and the images I had, but No under water pics of the dive and a waste of time and money...I understood all the specs and water ratings and yes it will take good under water pictures,  just don't bump it too hard!And if you want a camera that needs to be water 'proof',  don't buy this one.

Reviews.Title: Not Great
Reviews.Author: staci pickens
Reviews.Content: Ordered two in different colors for the kids.  One had faulty battery. Had to go buy memory card.  Usually I deal with DSLR and it's almost guaranteed that they will include a memory card with your package.  Had to replace battery that was another 35 dollars.  Sure that they would have done it for me but needed them for birthday presents twin girls.  You'd do better to buy a lumix.  It cost a little more but the pics are of better quality.

Reviews.Title: Robust camera
Reviews.Author: Zer
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in 2012. It worked very well. Water eventually got into it and it was definitely my fault. I left the audio port open (you'd see it at the top of the camera) and went into the water with it (beach). As soon as I noticed what happened, I literally started squeezing and shaking SALT WATER out of the camera. When I returned home, hours later, I dismantle the camera and washed it out with fresh water (tap water). I left it to dry in a bowl of rice for a few hours, reassembled it and switched it back on and it worked perfectly (out of water). I had forgotten to put the seal for the shutter when i reassembled it and it got filled with water again (second stupid mistake). This camera is very durable. The only con is having to change and test each setting until you get photo clarity.

Reviews.Title: Durable
Reviews.Author: Mary P. Hever
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sister as a wedding gift so they could take it on their honeymoon- she loved it.

Reviews.Title: New Cam!!!
Reviews.Author: Lynette Jones
Reviews.Content: What you see in photo is what you get! Excellent Product! I am eager to use it! Waiting for my next trip to Canaima National Park (VENEZUELA) or the next trip to the beach!

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your time
Reviews.Author: Ruben
Reviews.Content: Yes this camera has great features, some features not even mentioned in the product's description. Like the fact you can use it as a web cam, dust proof, freeze proof, and shock proof. Now here is the facts, horrible horrible quality. Bought this for my trip to Costa Rica. Thank heavens I tested it before going the image quality is horrible. No matter what setting you use the image is always blurry. I've read this in a review and decided to try it for myself. They were right! my half broken camera phone takes way better pictures at a mere 3.0 mega pixels the quality is far better than this camera. Is it water proof not sure wasn't gonna take the risk. Don,t waste your time.

Reviews.Title: not what I had hoped for.
Reviews.Author: Leann Dolan
Reviews.Content: Have had only one chance to use the camera so far. It's been underwater, splashed and tossed around. Works fine. Only complaint, can't see the lcd screen on a bright summer day. Had no idea if any of our pictures turned out until we got home. I was taking photos of children underwater. Did not end up with any decent pics. hoping to try again. Haven't found anything that would reduce the glare. A little disappointed but not giving up!

Reviews.Title: Coleman camera
Reviews.Author: Biker44
Reviews.Content: Camera was sent promtly and well packed. The instructions are next to unreadable and vague. The recomended SD I ordered with it did not fit, it needs a MICRO SD.I ordered one. I was lucky and found a back-up battery that fit. I guess its a new style and very unusual, hard to find. Pictures are out of focus and water gets into the lens. Coleman must have sold out their name to a cheapie camera maker, this does not meet any standard.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected from Coleman
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Coleman had always been a name I trusted in outdoor gear, but not in this case. Truely surprised with the low quality of this camera. Indoor pictures are below grade due to the substandard flash. The shutter speed is something I expect from a decade old digital camera; probably a full second behind. Although this is probably a new line for Coleman, they should take more care in what they put their name on.

Reviews.Title: Totally Useless POS
Reviews.Author: Ruby Jackson "cindygamehen"
Reviews.Content: You cannot click the shutter without moving the camera because the rubbery stuff they put on it to waterproof it hides the shutter button. Plus you cannot get the pictures off of it without removing the SD card and using a card reader or putting the card in a camera that has a USB transfer capability. They give you some software with the package that does not even talk to the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great product!!!
Reviews.Author: cpropst11
Reviews.Content: I just got this in today from ordering it 3 days ago. And I absolutely love it!! I was honestly a little afraid to test out the waterproof part because $80 is well $80. But I finally dropped it in our pool and took a picture with it and it still works and it took great pics!! The videos are great, and the pictures were a lot better than my other cameras! I don't see how this has bad reviews. The battery compartment is a little hard to get to shut completely the first few times but you need to have some brains to figure that you need to press hard to get it to snap shut and after you get it snapped shut, its no trouble! When you first get it, you need to change some settings to get the pictures and videos to turn out better but I've dealt with a lot of cameras in my time so I knew that in the first place. Definitely worth the money and I plan to take this out to Whitewater float trip in a few weeks. Great product, does everything it says and recommend this product!!!

Reviews.Title: Buy at your own risk!!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Let me start off by saying that everything I have ever bought from Coleman has been very reliable and trustworthy. That being said:This is the worst product I have found in a long time. We have a family vacation coming up, and we wanted to get a camera that we can use for underwater. We researched a few cameras, and decided to go with this one. There was only one review on the whole web, and now I know why. This thing is a piece of work.First off...you can't shut the door that leads to the battery and memory card. I have tried to even knock it on the table and it just won't close. It closes when it wants. I am happy to see they take "water proof" seriously, but it would be nice to be able to open and shut that door, especially when the charging port is in that door as well. We have been trying all night to close the door back up, and can not do so.The picture quality is bad. I haven't used it in the water yet (plan to this weekend), but I took a few indoor pics (with flash), and they looked worse than when I take them on my phone camera (a G1 google outdated phone).It is sturdy, but cheaply made. I know, you get what you buy; and that we did. The shipping was way too high for it taking 6 days to get here (when I paid extra ($20)for expedited mail). I ordered stuff directly from amazon at the same time and paid significantly less and they both showed up on the same day, same time.The "extra" battery that came with the kit doesn't fit the camera properly. It is a generic battery that pops out every time you try to charge the thing. You have to sit it in the right position and DO NOT TOUCH IT or it will pop out and won't charge.I will write more when I try it in the water.Ok, so now I have used it multiple times in and out of the water. This is an outdoor camera. Do not buy this if you take mostly indoor shots. You will be very disappointed. As I mentioned before, the flash sucks. It is a very weak flash, and it either over exposes the picture or way under exposes it.As for underwater...I have tried it in the crisp clear Lake Superior, some semi-murky lakes, and a couple pools. When I used it in the lakes you couldn't see anything. When I used it in the pools you couldn't get a clear shot ever. It takes a long time to take one picture, and by the time it shoots you don't have any breath left so all you see is a blur of a person. Those disposable underwater cameras work better than this camera. Even if you have it on sport you can't get a clear shot unless you tell the person you are shooting to stand really still and don't breath until the camera takes the picture.The video quality is decent for a digital camera. We got some really cool cliff jumping videos with this camera in Lake Superior. The only thing that really sucks is when you use the camera for video there is no sound. There is a plug to plug in a microphone, but the sound is basically non-existent. You can hear the zooming in and out very well. It clicks really loud in your video. That is all you can hear. You can't use the plug if you are near water as it may seep into the camera and ruin it. So if you want sound it has to be on dry land.Overall, I hate it less than I did when I opened the package, but I still am very disappointed in this product. I don't write reviews often for items, but this was worthy of warning people of what you are buying. Don't buy it. Get a disposable underwater camera if you want to take water pictures. Don't spend $100 on this product!

Reviews.Title: Camera destroyed after first snorkel trip
Reviews.Author: GLEN G BATEMAN
Reviews.Content: Went snorkeling for the first time with the new camera.  After shooting about 30 great photos, my finger caught the little rubber tab next to the power button.  The rubber tab flipped open and water filled the camera.  Didn't even know it happened until it was too late and the camera was full of water.  Poor design flaw!  Stuck in paradise with no means of capturing the beautiful array of sea life.  Very disappointed in the design of the camera.  You would think they would've thought it through to make sure no problems like this could've happened.

Reviews.Title: Colman water proof camra
Reviews.Author: Amazon  buyer
Reviews.Content: The camra had a couple of small rubber plugs that broke on the first day!Also the camra does not focus well on any thing moving. There is also a power save built In that makes the camra turn of every 60 seconds your not using it. Then you have to wait 15seconds to power back on.

Reviews.Title: Absolute POS camera - DO NOT BUY!!!
Reviews.Author: T. V. Edwards
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA - you'll be sorry you did!!Got this camera for our trip to Puerto Rico and the rainforest hoping to take great shots of the mountains, waterfalls, trails and Batey Zipline adventure.  What we got instead is a 100% totally useless POS - nothing.  It worked great indoors with a flash, but as soon as the flash is turned off and used outdoors, every single picture is blurry - close up or distant, cloudy or sunny. We found the images look good on the camera's small lcd and thought nothing of it. They look great as small, medium, & large thumbnails in windows.  When you view them (several different photo viewer programs) they ALL come out blurry. I've tried everything to fix them but nothing works.  All are lost.WHAT A WAIST - A TOTAL LOSS.  DO NOT BUY. PERIOD!I don't often review a product, but this is the worst camera or electonic I've ever purchased.On a good note.  We plan to return to Puerto Rico in a couple of years and would like to find a good underwater camera.  Anyone have a good recommendation to replace this POS?

Reviews.Title: Great underwater camera
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: This is actually a pretty functional little camera, which we bought for our grandchildren, ages 8 and 10.  They take it into the swimming pool and capture some pretty funny pictures of each other under water.  For the most part, pictures are clear both under water and out of the water. The video on it also works very well.  For the price, this is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Bought this for my daughter and she really likes it!
Reviews.Author: Lola Jean
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter.  She replaced her Nikon Coolpix (which was broken) with this one because it seemed more durable. She was even able to take some under-water shots when she took her kids to the public swimming pool.  I have never seen that feature in a small personal camera before!  It's a good sound camera that takes nice clear photos. She loves it!

Reviews.Title: Not too Shabby!
Reviews.Author: Kelsey
Reviews.Content: I chose to buy this camera for my trip to the Bahamas, even after reading bad reviews on it and I am glad I did! It was perfect for what I needed it for and I absolutely love the video setting, for underwater videos! But as far as some of the reviews go, one was helpful in particular, it is necessary to change all of the factory setting in order to get the maximum out of the camera. However the reason I did not give 5 stars, is because there were several times when all the pics would come out blurry but then again many pics were flawless and hard to believe they came out of that $70 Coleman! I was on the trip with people with super-duper underwater cameras that cost a fortune and they loved my little camera! :) I am very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Functional camera for snorkeling
Reviews.Author: Geoff
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a island-hopping trip in the Grenadines.  I bought the Coleman C5WP and 8GB micro card on faith, configured the camera on the airplane and put it to use when we landed in Grenada.  The directions are a little sketchy, but just go through the menu choices to set up the camera.  The package also includes a VERY IMPORTANT notice to be sure that the battery door is properly closed and the microphone port is plugged before you get the camera wet.  Now you're ready to go swimming.I found that the buttons were easy to find and use underwater.  The screen display is fairly large but the digital image is not very visible underwater.  I only checked the display underwater to make sure the camera was on before I took a shot.  If you have the anti-shake function on, be patient when clicking a shot - it may take a full second for the camera to take a picture.  On land I would recommend turning the anti-shake function off.Two things to avoid; don't get too close to your subject because the autofocus won't focus if you are too close.  Experiment with the camera beforehand to find the right distance.  Also forget the digital zoom function even with a tripod.  This is a point-n-shoot camera; my other camera with an optical zoom is far superior for zoom-in shots.The Coleman C5WP produced some good shots as long as the subject was evenly lit (bright glare and dark shadows are a problem).  Also, be sure to clean the camera with fresh water after exposing it to sea water which forms a film of salt on the lens.I had no problems with repeated use in salt water.  The battery held a charge for several hours if you use the 3-minute auto-shutoff option.  Just be sure the camera is on when you want to take a picture.The Coleman C5WP is a decent camera for the money, better than disposable cameras.  The lens is wide-angle which is good underwater but tends to distort images on land.  With practice it will be a functional, reliable camera for snorkeling.  Just don't expect postcard quality photos.  You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: not great
Reviews.Author: PHILLYTWIST
Reviews.Content: got this for my daughters birthday because she just got her divers certification and used it in the florida keys for diving she said at 30 ft the screen turned red and didnt take pictures at depths up to 20 ft it worked ok but the pics are not great flash doesnt work all the time  and under water pic are a little blurry many settings so maybe she didnt have the settings correct but instruction that came with it are almost noexistant

Reviews.Title: Underwater pics !
Reviews.Author: K. Kiley
Reviews.Content: I snorkle on vacation and used to buy cheap waterproof disposable cameras with not great results.  I bought this camera and it is completely waterproof, the pictures above and below water were excellent quality.  I would recommend this camera to anyone, good price and great results !

Reviews.Title: ok, for the price
Reviews.Author: Brian sirois
Reviews.Content: So far the camera seems ok. I keep having to remove the battery and reinstalling it or purposely drop it to make a good battery connection. I bought this camera specifically fora vacation in Cozumel to take underwater video and pictures. It did its job for that, I just wish the image quality was better and the battery problems were fixed. Also the battery door is quite tight, I don't think my wife would be able to close it without it opening underwater.

Reviews.Title: bad pics
Reviews.Author: Jena
Reviews.Content: Horrible picture quality above and underwater.  Very disappointed with this purchase.  Will be buying different brand for underwater pictures next time.

Reviews.Title: Poor experience with this item.
Reviews.Author: Sujith Niyangoda
Reviews.Content: Had to return it. Wouldn't keep a charge.  Don't know if it was the charger or the camera. They came together.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera but a bit fickle.
Reviews.Author: Edwina Niedfeldt
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for our big Mexico vacation this year, it came in super quick which was a relief however the battery wouldn't charge so we had to purchase another one because it wouldn't have shipped before we left. I know we cut it close when ordering the camera but one would think all the pieces would work.It took great photo's and the quality seems great. However we also noticed once arriving in Mexico that the camera it self wouldn't hold a charge. We charged it overnight before we left and everything looked fine but after a 6 hour flight (during which we took no photo's) it was dead by the time we got to the resort. The same thing happened the next day it was charging for hours but and had a full battery but when we brought it on an excursion with us it was dead by the time we got on the boat. Needless to say we were pretty upset, so upset my husband took to man-handling the camera a bit to discover that it was actually just the battery again,that was loose. Once he sort of snapped it into place correctly the camera was fine.Again it takes good photos and we were able to do quite a bit of snorkeling as well as just taking regular photo's with it eventually but it was a bit of hassle.

Reviews.Title: mas o menos
Reviews.Author: maria evangelina
Reviews.Content: the camera is absolutely beautiful. I love the blue color is so beautiful and fragile at the same time ... the only problem is that they sent with damaged drums .... and here in Venezuela are not products of that brand so .... advice .. Try it before sending a product to see if it works well ..... so I put them 3 star.

Reviews.Title: get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: bright light, bright light
Reviews.Content: was excited....then disappointed......used it as a trial at my kids concert and the video was shaky.....the sound was horrible and before i left i had to make sure the microphone plug was in securely because it had come out earlier in the day.....i'm working on sending it back....just not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it.
Reviews.Author: Samuel L. Cook "Kempers Mama Bonnie"
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift for Christmas through Amazon and silly me, waited until Christmas for my son to open it. This camera is worse then his kid camera. The battery drains after a couple pictures even though it was fully charged like the instructions said and the zoom is so blurry that you can't make out what the picture is suppose to be. Very disappointed. I just want my money back. We grabbed a camera from Walmart and as soon as he turned it on, it worked! Amazon won't help me because it has been over 30 days to return it. I just got off the phone with the Coleman manufacturer and they will not help me because I bought it through Amazon. I am not happy! $74 bucks down the drain :O(

Reviews.Title: Thank you, my son loves it!
Reviews.Author: Melissa Simmons
Reviews.Content: My son loves it...it is easy to use and kid friendly!  He uses it near water to take pictures of nature and it is perfect for him.

Reviews.Title: Incredible steal of a deal
Reviews.Author: TerryGA
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my son, he was headed to Hawaii and needed an underwater camera. He loved it. Incredible value on Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Horrible product!
Reviews.Author: melchy
Reviews.Content: My husband couldn't even get this camera to take a charge and he is tech savvy. Spend more and get quality. This is not your best option.....

Reviews.Title: Great for outdoor photography
Reviews.Author: K. Kmett
Reviews.Content: Camera is great for taking on the boat, or hiking. It's  a manageable size, convenient to carry in your pocket or fishing vest.

Reviews.Title: OK, but not great.
Reviews.Author: Arthur Jacobs "IR Student"
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived and it is water proof.  The funtions are a bit odd to figure out but it works.

Reviews.Title: Not waterproof, pictures were horrible
Reviews.Author: Sheryl A Highton
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our daughter for Christmas because it was Extreme, waterproof, and had image stabilization.  First off, the image stabilization is an option that you have to turn on by going through the menus every time you turn the camera on.  It does not save your settings.  Pictures are way to blurry without it.  Second - we brought it to take pictures of the kids going down the water sides at Great Wolf lodge.  The camera did get way, but not submerged.  It is not water proof, there is more water in the camera then in the pool.  Very upsetting.  I am not sure if we just got a lemon because the rest of the reviews are great.

Reviews.Title: Bad product
Reviews.Author: Sean Clayton
Reviews.Content: Horrible product, first camera arrived with broken menu button, and te replacement arrived and failed in 2ft of water.  Not at all worth it.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: francisco pulido
Reviews.Content: very good morning really very grateful and happy with the product. It was really what I expected. the product of superb quality. I recommend really good attention and service

Reviews.Title: Difficult buttons
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: The buttons are hard to press and the quality of pictures are not the best. The seal for waterproofing the camera is legit on the battery/SD slot, meaning it takes some effort to actually close. Not a convenient one handed job.

Reviews.Title: Waterproof my ASS not
Reviews.Author: Bryan O
Reviews.Content: I had this Camra under water taking video of Lopster under rocks and fish too. My son was so happy that I was going to show him the Video and when I attemtted to show video's or pic. open it up and my 8g card was damage and water came out. I did send it back with full $$.

Reviews.Title: Not the best picture quality.
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a recent trip but after taking some sample pictures I realized the quality of the pictures stink.  I opted instead to use a waterproof case for my iphone and got way better pictures.I would imagine this would be ok if you are really scuba diving but I wanted to use it around a pool and out in wet weather.  Definitely not very high quality images for me.

Reviews.Title: Strat the fun.
Reviews.Author: Ivanhome
Reviews.Content: I got these for the grandkid, we took them to Zion N.P. they worked great. then took them in the swimming pool and had a blast taking pictures under water. Fun and tuff.

Reviews.Title: bad purchasing :(
Reviews.Author: airan
Reviews.Content: I disagree with the product as I have come with the camera fails does not work without the cable and the battery does not seem very original I'm very sad about this purchase thank many would know them if I get my money back: (

Reviews.Title: Not what we had hoped
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Stowe "Kauai Swimmer"
Reviews.Content: We bought this because we thought we'd need an underwater camera when we were on vacation; however, we did not use it underwater and about half of our pictures turned out to be blurry which we couldn't tell until we downloaded them at home.  I also couldn't register it.  I got an error with a message to contact the company, but they never responded so it didn't do us any good.  I'm not sure if we'll use it again.

Reviews.Title: This camera was brand new, I don't know why  stopped working after one use.
Reviews.Author: maria peters
Reviews.Content: This item I gave it as a present to my friend. He told me that after using once underwater,stopped working.

Reviews.Title: GARBBAGE
Reviews.Author: chris latza
Reviews.Content: the camera leaked water while I was scuba diving - that camera was only 3 feet down - it did last for about an hour then it failed.  the lens fogged up, and it never worked after that

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: Erodes Aguirre
Reviews.Content: Bad quiality of image... but is nice and good price............... in the nigth take bad pictures hummm it all .

Reviews.Title: underwater camera
Reviews.Author: Rose Raynak
Reviews.Content: I never figured a camera would take good pictures underwater - I was pleasantly surprised with this one.  Great purchase

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Jessica Morgan
Reviews.Content: My kids love this camera.Takes good pictures.Pocket sized.Floats!Bright Color.Great product.Would order another for my other kids.

Reviews.Title: Functional
Reviews.Author: TV yes
Reviews.Content: Loved this camera. Bought for my daughter for trip to Caribbean and how appropriate for the beach. The photos are perfect. I recommend!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Michael James Rubi
Reviews.Content: I was just looking for a camera that I could take underwater photos with. Well, that's all it's good for. I wouldn't really say it's even good at that though. If you want an underwater camera invest a little more money, my cellphone takes better photos than this (out of water obviously)

Reviews.Title: Customer service sucks
Reviews.Author: Ray Hill
Reviews.Content: I received the product from amazon as promised. When I went to charge the camera battery I discivered the camera charging port was broken, I contacted Coleman and was told it would be at least 3 week repair or replacement. That wasn't going to work sense I was schuled to go in vacation in 4 days.

Reviews.Title: A Lemon
Reviews.Author: sewingkittycat
Reviews.Content: I just want to say I did use this camera for around three months mostly in and around a water park environment,it just recently leaked water into the lens and everything destroying the camera and any videos/photos I had taken.One problem with this camera is it has no external microphone,so if you want to hear your sound being recorded played back you'll have to play the video on a computer or something else to hear it, you can't play it back on the camera.You have to make sure the microphone plug is closed before going underwater,because if you don't water will get into the camera..Buyer beware.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: J. Spica
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a 'next step' camera for my 7 year old.  She loves to take pictures, but her old fisher price toddler camera was not doing the trick as she wanted to be able to print off pictures she took.  I was hoping that this camera would be able to withstand the care level a 7 year old might give it but give her photos to be proud of.  However, I am very disappointed in this camera.  It is barely better than the toddler fisher price model!-The stabilization is terrible on this camera.  It is also not default in setting to turn on image stabilization.  When I turn it on for my daughter, it reverts back to none after shutting off.- The shutter speed is incredibly slow, so almost all of her pictures are unfocused and blurry- The menu is complicated and cumbersome to navigate-The flash setting makes everyone look glow in the dark bright, completely unnatural looking-Overall quality of pictures is very low.-Very hard to take a 'good' picture.  I used this camera at the beach on a nice day- seemed like a good test to get an 'idea' picture.  However, I struggled to get a decent shot of my kids.  It would hardly focus, most pictures were blurry, and just hard to use!The camera is a good size for kids and seems quite durable.  But, I wouldn't waste my money on this product!  Stay away!

Reviews.Title: Used in waterparks
Reviews.Author: Claudio Mario Castro
Reviews.Content: Great quality in underwater photos, it can be used to take normal pictures, but sometimes the fish eye lens can change the borders and size of figures.  Maybe I was not able to fix the right elections to shoot, but in spite of that, it is a great camera, small, easy to carry, good quality of images (12 MP) and good at recording videos too (great in waterparks slides!).

Reviews.Title: Battery door popped open the 1st time I used it, that was 3 weeks ago and it still doesnt work...terrible battery door design!!
Reviews.Author: teresa smith
Reviews.Content: Battery door popped open the 1st time I used it, that was 3 weeks ago and it still doesnt work...terrible battery door design!!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: A1toad
Reviews.Content: Great little camera and Great price.Perfect little camera to take to the beach or water park. Remember this is just a pocket camera, but takes good picture overall.

Reviews.Title: haven't had a chance to use it yet
Reviews.Author: R. Wake
Reviews.Content: the first camera arrived defective in that it would not charge...obtained a replacement promptly(to Amazon's credit) which seemed to be functional in that it charged and would take pictures ok..we took this camera on our 2-week vacation to Hawaii happily anticipating some excelent underwater pics but to our utter disappointment this camera leaked during its first use while snorkeling with sea turtles on Maui...I would be willing to give another one of these cameras a chance but sadly our once-in-a-lifetime vacation is over. My suggestion to anyone who buys this camera is to test it in the sink before taking it swimming.

Reviews.Title: Would not recommend due to reliability.
Reviews.Author: Humberto V
Reviews.Content: Camera stopped working midway through first use on vacation. Could not determine if due to bad battery or camera. Camera would not charge using the supplied cable and adapter.There are some scratches on the body but no sign of water/moisture in the camera.Good point - Pictures of underwater reef were very good.

Reviews.Title: Great for my boat
Reviews.Author: John Brocus
Reviews.Content: I keep this camera on the boat all the time, you never know when your going to need one. This a great little camera, light, zoom and the price was right.

Reviews.Title: perfect for my grandson
Reviews.Author: Alex C Fabris III
Reviews.Content: grandson dropped his last one so this ruggedized version should work better for him, he loves it so far...took it to a water park the first day

Reviews.Title: Worst camera ever
Reviews.Author: South Florida beachbum
Reviews.Content: We researched cameras before purchasing this one and it seemed like it would be great for the price.  We were so wrong.  You can tell it is made by a company that does not make cameras.  Think about it.  They make coolers.  The camera is not set up the way normal cameras are.  Very difficult to figure out how to do everything, from viewing pictures just taken to getting the battery compartment closed.  It comes with no memory card so be sure to add that price on and its microSD and can only take up to 8GB.  After 2 uses at the beach, the camera started leaking.  Be sure to keep your packing information and be prepared to send it back.  Use it underwater before the warrantee expires or you won't get a full refund.  Buy a Fugifilm instead.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Renita C. Miller
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical about purchasing this camera after reading some of the reviews.  But once I got it and took pictures I was very satisfied with my purchase.  I mainly bought it to take pictures when my family and I went snorkeling in Destin, FL.  Even though the water was not as clear because it had rained, the pictures were still of good quality.  The pictures above water were fantastic and so is the video!.  My only compaint is that the instructional manual is not too helpful but if you already own a camera you can learn to operate it.  I also love the fact that I can charge the battery and that the charge last a good amount of time.  I am truly happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Bad Product
Reviews.Author: Carlos Gomezese
Reviews.Content: It really is a product that delivers what it promises, the first thing he says that is 12 megapixel but really NO is equivalent to 12 megapixels by interpolation. The battery is disconnected and looks as if it had ended after taking two or three shots, after leave it off for a short period, it seems full battery!. The image quality and optics are but not fresh!, But worse, to dip only 70 cm, water enters the chamber and damaged! My purchase decision was based on the brand COLEMAN it was for me synonymous with strength and durability, but it is very unfortunate that Coleman put his mark on a product so poorly.

Reviews.Title: 1st. was DOA, second is very good.
Reviews.Author: Curtis Smith
Reviews.Content: The replacement functions fine and gives good performance, have not used in water yet. Note that if the battery door can move at all then it is not latched, press very firmly & if necessary push up a little on the latch release, there will be a very distinct click when it is secure and absolutely no movement of the door when you press on it. The first arrival seemed unable to make contact with it's battery or to have a dead battery, it arrived with the battery not in a wrapper and the apparent battery wrapper wadded up in the package and as far as I can recall missing the quality control sticker the second one had on it's lower front. Wondering if the first one was a re-packed return.

Reviews.Title: Slow and leaky
Reviews.Author: B. Hart "Investigator & analyst"
Reviews.Content: I like to have a camera with me when I scull at sunrise. Occasional great pic opportunities. I used to use Fuji 35mm throw aways, but sometimes the film would sit in the camera for a year before being full.  So I bought this one.  This camera is MUCH TOO SLOW to respond and take a pic. (Sorry I didn't time it.)  I was very pleased with the color and definition in the pictures it took of still subjects such as sunrises. However moving subject opportunities such as birds, river banks, and people have gone by or changed position by the time it finally takes.  Being a digital zoom, expect trade-offs.  Also, NEVER had it at the beach or in the water.  Might have gotten rained on once, or water splashed on it.  The compartment was sealed.  However water got inside somehow and destroyed the camera.

Reviews.Title: Only 3 Fotos, really?!1
Reviews.Author: Harvey L. Noble
Reviews.Content: Just put the battery in and a 8 gig Micro SD card and plugged in the charge cord to use it the next day.  Surprise, as soon as you unplug the cord the battery indicator drops to 2 out of 3 bars.  Took 3 quick pictures and the low batt light comes on. This after all night on the charger.  Brought it back to the hotel and plugged it in again for 24 hrs. Same exact thing happens. It has some cheap Chinese battery in it, I just hope I can find a replacement around here fast so it doesn't kill the vacation.

Reviews.Title: overall .. good.
Reviews.Author: xtina13shop
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my dad as a father's day gift this past June and he likes it. He says it takes great pictures outside of the water and good ones inside. They come out blurry more than half the time, but he says when he gets the good ones, they're great. He had no issues upon is first couple times using it up until about a couple weeks ago (it has barely been 2 months since the purchse) he says the usb port on the camera to upload photos is loose. He has to hold it a certain way in order for it to sync up properly. That's the main downfall we're having; so I'll be exchanging it for him soon. If it happens again, I will return it and purchase a different product.

Reviews.Title: A very bad purchase!
Reviews.Author: Miguelina Butron
Reviews.Content: I was very happy to see a Coleman product like this! I'm a Coleman consumer because of my lifestyle. Unfortunately, I did a very bad choice: this camera doesn't work. It only powers on when its connected, if you disconnect from the power (electricity) it doesn't work; so, I did a very bad choice.I live very far from US, so, it is not worth it to send it back. I loosed my money and my time.

Reviews.Title: .Broke the first day.  All photos looked like you are in a fun house
Reviews.Author: Laura Parker
Reviews.Content: Broke the first day.  All photos looked like you are in a fun house.  I am trying to send back.

Reviews.Title: It is okay...
Reviews.Author: Cezar Mattoso
Reviews.Content: If you need just a camera waterproof without  to much quality, it is perfect but if you are looking something with a quality a plenty of a  cel cam you should look for another one.The quality of the sensor it is no good when you look at the scream, there is a delay of the moviments.Another hand, the camera are strong  enough and the camera floats on sea..

Reviews.Title: Sucks
Reviews.Author: Mattman
Reviews.Content: It was a very bad camera. When I brought it on vacation to Costa Rica last summer I went to take a picture and it wouldn't work.  I didn't have any other camera so it ruined my vacation. I hate it and wish I never bought it.  It's a total waste of money.  I put One star but I would have liked to put none.  This is a total waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Nice pictures
Reviews.Author: D. Emry
Reviews.Content: Takes nice clear pictures.  Controls are easy to learn.  As described in reviews the latch is difficult to unlatch and relatch but with care it works.

Reviews.Title: good adventure camera.
Reviews.Author: john paul haley
Reviews.Content: defiantly waterproof, mudproof, dustproof. i submerged it in a swamp for a while and its fine. its only 12mp so it doesn't have the best picture in the world, easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: Awaiting replacement
Reviews.Author: WhitePepper Korndle
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera that I could let my 9-year-old son take to Camp. It needed to be sturdy, water-resistant, dust-resistant, and boy-resistant. This appeared to fit the bill.But 1) It's very hard to turn on. Maybe that's a design feature, so it doesn't turn on accidentally, but by the time you get the darn thing powered up, the shot is missed.2) EXTREMELY short battery life. I *may* have gotten a bad one, which is why I'm going to try a replacement. (My regular dslr takes hundreds of shots w/out needing charged, but this was SAD.) On a full charge, leaving Thursday afternoon, it was dead by lunch on Saturday (I attended Camp with the kid; I toted it most of the time. I know it wasn't mishandled.)The kid really likes it; it's camo green, and rugged-looking. A "guy" camera, as it were (if you're 9). So I'm going to try the replacement and see if the next one is any better.I'll update this review if my opinion of the product changes.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Demetria
Reviews.Content: STILL LEARNING HOW TO USE IT, BUT ITS GREAT. I CAN'T WAIT TO GO ON MY NEXT WATER TRIP, WHICH IS SOON

Reviews.Title: Great little camera for underwater pictures and video
Reviews.Author: Artemio Mendoza Garcia
Reviews.Content: I took photos and videos on around 25 ft deep in three dives I did just some weeks ago, and they are amazing.Sure, they don't look like stuff taken with a +$2,000 setup, but didn't cost that much neither!For everybody who is complaining, you need to follow instructions, really, I don't understand why are so many negative reviews. It worked fine for me underwater, and I lasted +40 minutes every session, around 25 feet.Just added some photos for you to see; they're taken with no flash or any other light. I think they can give you a better idea that this camera really works.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Luis Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: excellent product, very useful and good images. is a good investment to acquire this product. It's great. I am satisfied with the product

Reviews.Title: It is a new toy
Reviews.Author: William S Hart
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera I didn't have to worry about water;dust;etc. My other cameras are big; expensive; and sensitive. Some times I just wanted to be able to take a quick shot of a subject to catalog it (time and place) to return with my gear and do it right. I have played with this camera around my home (I live in the Desert) and so far it is working great.

Reviews.Title: Works good
Reviews.Author: Joseph M. Hicks "Joe"
Reviews.Content: Works for what I got it for.  If you need to get a work camera it works. Need three words

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Francys A.
Reviews.Content: great camera. light, nice design, the movement it is not controlled, but it's ok. it's a good camera for sure.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: For the most part this is a fantastic camera. I got it mostly so I could take images while out on the water because we do a lot of water sports and I love photographing our outings. I have had some issues with grainy looking photos when the settings are on "auto" but nothing major.

Reviews.Title: Sore fingers
Reviews.Author: Ron in VA
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures, but closing the battery flap is impossible!!!  My fingers are sore from pushing and pulling the flap(latch).

Reviews.Title: so-so...
Reviews.Author: waterguy
Reviews.Content: This camera is only "so-so" in my opinion....The capabilities are great! The durability is awesome. The video capabilities are also kool!However, the problem i have with the camera is taking decent/clear pictures.Just about every still shot picture i take is blurry. i have adjusted the settings in just about every way i could and the results are always similar. i find myself using the video alot more and then i extract the single shots from it. My buddy has a Hero camera and i have found that they take a clearer image. so if i could do it all over again, i would have resorted to the hero camera which is about $40 more.That said--i just bought a second camera specificaly for still shots.But if your looking for one camera to do it all and your on a tight budget, then this could be the one.

Reviews.Title: only lasted 4 days
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to take with us to our destination wedding. We got it because of the time in the pool , ocean and excursions we wanted to do. We had previously had another brand of water camera and it worked great until we lost it. THIS ONE DID NOT MAKE IT 4 DAYS. We barely even had it in the pool for those four days and never got to take it on our tour as it had already quit working properly. It started out getting foggy and eventually quit working altogether.  Unfortunately we bought it to far in advance of the trip and now are unable to return it. DO NOT buy this camera.

Reviews.Title: Buy this!
Reviews.Author: Bruce Palombo
Reviews.Content: This little camera is great!! You have to find the right settings, and generally be pretty still while shooting, but the shots are fantastic!  The video is good too.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: B. Homan "crafty mama"
Reviews.Content: This is a good looking camera, but thats about it. It takes really crappy pictures, the flash only works sometimes, and it is not user friendly.

Reviews.Title: water proof
Reviews.Author: jay
Reviews.Content: went to the beach perfect camera for all the sand & water that i didn't want to get in my $2,000.00 camera

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Rob Smarz "R M S"
Reviews.Content: I bought this Camera to bring on vacation to Costa Rica and when I got there my camera didn't work so I couldn't make memories. Never buying this again and don't waste your money if you want an underwater camera.

Reviews.Title: Works Great-Under Water
Reviews.Author: Hershey Handyman
Reviews.Content: I would have given it a five star rating had it been able to take nice pictures zoomed in. Every time I zoomed in, the picture lost it's clarity.I took underwater video with it while vacationing in the islands. I was impressed with the quality of the video. The video I took while sailing was also very nice. The still pictures I took underwater were also decent, providing I didn't try to zoom in. It was well worth the price, especially when compared to the disposable underwater cameras I always used. The picture quality was better and the quantity taken quickly paid for itself when compared to the disposable ones. I would recommend purchasing this little inexpensive camera. Just remember to make sure all compartments are snapped shut. You will hear the click when it latches.

Reviews.Title: so so
Reviews.Author: Pamela
Reviews.Content: We didn't think the pictures are all that great and camera is hard to navigate.  I would suggest buying something else.

Reviews.Title: Does the Job!
Reviews.Author: Gustavo
Reviews.Content: Well, I just bought it. First I thougt I had lost my 70 bucks on it.But then, (READ THIS WELL) I manage to configurate the camera, and I've got to say that it's great.It's all about the configuration!Works great, it takes great pictures and great videos underwater,I've tested it in a pool and it was so cool.It is a cheap camera so, if you are expecting it to be like a expensive one dont buy it.It takes cool videos, cool photos, for a low price!By the way, THANKS!Check on my twitter for photos samples: @GustavitoMalave

Reviews.Title: Awesome...
Reviews.Author: sheena a lovelace
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a birthday gift for a 9yr old boy. He aboslutely loved the yellow (his favorite color). This was also one of the few I found in yellow. He has already put it through the tests only as a 9yr old could. It has with stood it's promise. He has already dropped it numerous times, several from pretty decent heights, and he loves the fact that he can take it underwater. I would definitely buy one again. It's a pretty hardy camera.

Reviews.Title: Multiple fails within 5 minutes of using
Reviews.Author: Sunrsie, FL
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera with some hesitation after reading the reviews.  The wrist strap broke the first time I put it on.  It also flooded in 2 feet of water in about 5 minutes and ruined the battery and micro SD card we purchased for it.  This is not a great underwater camera design.  They should remove the microphone option as the cover does not like to stay on and it is one avenue for water to get in.  We are returning it to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Leaks
Reviews.Author: Truc
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my vacation to use primarily while snorkeling. The camera leaked while submerged under less than 1 foot of water. I was able to take only 4-5 pictures before the entire camera stopped working. The underwater pictures that were taken however, did turn out nicley, better then the out of water pictures. I'll purchase the Hero camera next.

Reviews.Title: Lots of settings!
Reviews.Author: Chief Calusa
Reviews.Content: Gonna take time to master all the settings, I cant wait to go snorkeling with it haven't had a chance yet,,

Reviews.Title: Professional Results / Amature Price
Reviews.Author: David Frantzis "Trevor"
Reviews.Content: Pans and zooms, big time.  Thought I was watching a television spot while using the pan function.  Did someone publish me?  Why by a scanner?

Reviews.Title: Excellent !!
Reviews.Author: Yoa
Reviews.Content: A very nice camera. Good for the hole family. You can take it to the beach, pool.. is excellent. As expected

Reviews.Title: Totally Useless POS
Reviews.Author: Ruby Jackson "cindygamehen"
Reviews.Content: First of all, there is no way get the pictures off the camera onto a PC except to remove the SD card and put it in another camera or a card reader. Major hassle. Worse yet, the button you click to actually take a picture is so hard to push that you cannot do it without moving the camera which of course ruins the picture. The problem is the rubbery coating that is supposed to make it waterproof hides the shutter button and unless you had extremely small fingers or can push it with just the tip of a fingernail...

Reviews.Title: We love it
Reviews.Author: Tara Ashley "mountains5"
Reviews.Content: We took this camera to Belize and went snorkeling with it.  AWESOME picture.  Wish I would have found this camera sooner.

Reviews.Title: Don't get this for a child
Reviews.Author: BJ Reynolds "Scout"
Reviews.Content: I thought this camera would be good for my 8-year-old grandson.  It looked very sturdy.  However, the quality of the images is quite poor, which made him feel bad.  I tried the camera myself, and it sure doesn't look like 12 MP quality.  What was I thinking, buying a camera made by a company that makes tents and coolers?  Buy a camera made by a camera company!

Reviews.Title: Cool Gadget.
Reviews.Author: travis
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my fiancée. I was planning to propose at the dolphin encounter in Orlando and thought it would be a cool thing to bring. We used this all day snapping pictures of tropical fish and sharks. Can’t wait to bring it on our scalloping trip this year.

Reviews.Title: I hate it : looks nice  but does not work !!!
Reviews.Author: TATIANA BARBOSA
Reviews.Content: It was a gift to Christmas and not work on Dec,24th ( when I opened the box , the camera was not work). After change battery , and open the camera in a maintenance in Brazil, the result is that the electronic system is not good. Nothing to do - only if the supplier send another new camera !!!!!!! Terrible.

Reviews.Title: it d'osent work
Reviews.Author: Giuseppe Lopano Leone "Antonio Stenta"
Reviews.Content: it a bad product, it d'osent work. D'ont buy this product the camera have bigs problems. I want my money back

Reviews.Title: Extreme piece of crap is what it is!
Reviews.Author: Curt Young
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this camera as well for a trip to the Caribbean. I was hoping to use it on some diving excursions I was going on. I am sure glad I tested it out before just assuming it worked well. The shutter delay is horribly slow. I know it is not a SLR but for a simple point and shoot, this is the worst delay I have ever experienced. It takes about a 1/2 to a full second for the picture to take afeter you push the button. Because of this, if there is any movement at all, the picture is blurry of what you are trying to capture has moved on. Inside, outside, it doesnt matter.  I don't make a living taking pictures but I am into photography. I have played with all the settings and nothings seems to help. Spend the extra money and get the Panasonic. That is what I bought to replace this one after I returned it. The only down fall on that one is it is only rated down to 16 feet. This was rated down to 33 but unless you can freeze the fish for a second, you will never get any good shots. Save yourself the headache and buy something else.

Reviews.Title: Defective Camera
Reviews.Author: JOANNY JORGES
Reviews.Content: Good night The camera is bad, does not take pictures with flash, when I try to take them off the camera. I write the comment in this way because Amazon is not giving me the option to contact the seller. I ask please respond. thanks

Reviews.Title: dont buy this cameras
Reviews.Author: Rfael Velez
Reviews.Content: A real piece of s***, do not buy this crap, came broken, sent it back for garanty but came with the same problemsDont waste your money in this piece of garbage.

Reviews.Title: Coleman Waterproof Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Janice H.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son for his future honeymoon.  He was thrilled and can't wait to use it.  I was very impressed with the quality of the camera.  There will be a lot of happy memories captured with this product.  I recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: Very low quality
Reviews.Author: Chente
Reviews.Content: Coleman did a terrible job at boxing this it shook around in the box first off. Second the quality of photos is very poor. i found the 9 megapixel setting to be more clear than the 12 m.p. setting...imagine that. I had a 8gb card in it so that wasnt the problem. Straight lines are pixelated and fine landscape like drivway pebbles and water look distorted at best. I know its only an 80 dollar camera and you get what you pay for but come on my 50 dollar 3 megapixel phone camera is a better quality. Dont waste your money im returning it now to buy a fuji thats only 25 bucks more and has way better ratings.

Reviews.Title: My nephew adore it
Reviews.Author: Marian
Reviews.Content: Its easy to use but the battery its charge about 3 hrs We wish that the battery were more time charged

Reviews.Title: 12MP? No way
Reviews.Author: Avid fisherman
Reviews.Content: Seems like a decent enough unit but do not expect 12 mega pixel pictures from this camera. Maybe 3 MP would be closer. So for the money it is not bad, just misrepresented. They should advertise nice 3MP waterproof camera and then it would be a 5 star deal. So great for it's utility, just not great pictures.

Reviews.Title: lo peor que pude comprar
Reviews.Author: Vialcer Anzola G "vag"
Reviews.Content: las fotos son horribles no enfoca bien mala resolución y de paso en la pagina oficial de coleman no existe esta cámara malo malo no lo compren

ProductInfo.Features:
12.0 Megapixel resolution on a 2.7" LCD screen
Waterproof up to 33 feet
10 scene modes with anti-shake technology
Micro SD supports up to 8 GB
Self timer and smile shutter
ProductInfo.Name: Coleman Xtreme C5WP 12 MP 33ft Waterproof Digital Camera
